ns:common.topic.description: Action Code Script is a scripting language used in video games such as HeXen and some modern Doom source ports, such as ZDoom. It is syntactically similar to C, but less flexible.
rdfs:label: Action Code Script

ns:common.document.text: Action Code Script (ACS) is a scripting language used in video games such as HeXen and some modern Doom source ports, such as ZDoom. It is syntactically similar to C, but less flexible.

ns:type.object.name: Action Code Script
